publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1904 Mr John Home Robertson: Deplorable Comments by Bruce McFee MSP—That the Parliament condemns the description of the Union Flag as a "butcher’s apron" by Bruce McFee MSP; calls on Mr McFee to withdraw his statement and to apologise for this offensive slur on the flag of the Black Watch battle group, and deplores this implied attack on the exemplary conduct of Scottish military personnel serving in the peacekeeping force in Iraq.

S2M-1904 Deplorable Comments by Bruce McFee MSP (lodged on 27 October 2004) Mr Jamie Stone*, Murdo Fraser*, Phil Gallie*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mike Pringle*, Mr David Davidson*, Des McNulty*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Trish Godman*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Margaret Jamieson*, Helen Eadie*, Scott Barrie*, Alex Johnstone*, Janis Hughes*, Mr Duncan McNeil*, Cathie Craigie*, Mr Brian Monteith*

S2M-1904 Mr John Home Robertson: Deplorable Comments by Bruce McFee MSP—That the Parliament condemns the description of the Union Flag as a "butcher’s apron" by Bruce McFee MSP; calls on Mr McFee to withdraw his statement and to apologise for this offensive slur on the flag of the Black Watch battle group, and deplores this implied attack on the exemplary conduct of Scottish military personnel serving in the peacekeeping force in Iraq. Supported by: Mr Jamie Stone, Murdo Fraser, Phil Gallie, Dr Elaine Murray, Mike Pringle, Mr David Davidson, Des McNulty, Mr Frank McAveety, Trish Godman, Ms Wendy Alexander, Margaret Jamieson, Helen Eadie, Scott Barrie, Alex Johnstone, Janis Hughes, Mr Duncan McNeil, Cathie Craigie, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Alasdair Morrison*
S2M-1904 Deplorable Comments by Bruce McFee MSP (lodged on 27 October 2004) Karen Whitefield*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*
S2M-1904 Deplorable Comments by Bruce McFee MSP (lodged on 27 October 2004) Christine May*
